Furthermore , aim evaluate safety performance various CTO specific guidewires , device ( CrossBoss/Stingray dissection ren-entry device ) recognise approve technique ( retrograde wire escalation , retrograde dissection re-etry technique ) . DOC.detailed_description: This objectives single-center CTO registry : 1 . Gather prospective clinical data consecutive patient undergo complex difficult CTO PCI procedure include include patient demographic date , cardiac risk factor , procedural technical data ( contrast volume , radiation exposure , procedure time procedural success/outcome rate . 2 . Evaluate safety performance various CTO dedicate guidewires , device ( CrossBoss/Stingray anterior dissection re-entry device ) recognise approve technique ( retrograde wire escalation , retrograde dissection re-etry technique ) . 3 . Evaluate incidence severity recognize complication coronary dissection , coronary perforation ( +/- need emergency pericardiocentesis ) , acute kidney injury , radiation injury , access site vascular complication . 4 . Evaluate medium-term outcome ( recurrence symptom , major cardiovascular event ( cardiac death , myocardial infarction , target lesion revascularization , target vessel revascularization ) routine out-patient consultation ( planned part normal standard care ) 1 year post successful CTO PCI . After consultation , patient may choose cardiology follow-up UZ Leuven his/her refer cardiologist .
